articles.title: Inside Mirakl’s Agent Commerce Vision
articles.summary: Mirakl, a leading e-commerce platform, has unveiled its Agent Commerce vision, which leverages AI-powered agents to revolutionize online shopping experiences. This innovative approach enables personalized product recommendations, streamlined customer support, and enhanced merchant services. By harnessing the power of AI agents, Mirakl aims to transform the e-commerce landscape and drive business growth for its partners.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities to analyze complex data and provide personalized interventions. The grants will enable scientists to investigate AI-driven approaches to improve mental health outcomes and address pressing issues in the field.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with NORAD to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to create a more interactive and immersive experience for children tracking Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. This collaboration aims to bring new magic to the beloved tradition, which has been a holiday staple for over 60 years. With OpenAI's innovative technology, the program promises to deliver a more engaging and personalized experience for kids worldwide.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, a company that helps businesses implement AI solutions, to accelerate the adoption of enterprise AI. This partnership aims to make AI more accessible and integrated into daily business operations, driving innovation and efficiency. By combining forces, OpenAI and Thrive Holdings can empower more companies to harness the power of AI and drive digital transformation.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to help businesses accelerate their AI adoption and drive innovation. This collaboration aims to enable enterprises to harness the power of AI and achieve tangible results, from improving operational efficiency to enhancing customer experiences. By combining Accenture's industry expertise with OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, companies can unlock new opportunities for growth and transformation.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest release of Transformers v5 introduces simplified model definitions, making it easier for developers to integrate and customize AI models. This update has the potential to accelerate innovation in the AI ecosystem by reducing complexity and increasing accessibility. With v5, developers can more efficiently build and deploy AI-powered applications, driving advancements in natural language processing and beyond.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new model that promises to revolutionize text-to-image synthesis. This innovative technology enables more efficient and higher-quality image generation, opening up new possibilities for creative applications. With FLUX-2, users can expect improved performance and more realistic results in image creation tasks.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence and machine learning models. This method, developed from first principles, has the potential to significantly improve the performance and scalability of AI systems. By optimizing data batching, this innovation could lead to breakthroughs in areas like natural language processing and computer vision.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a breakthrough technology that accelerates TRL (Transfer, Relax, and Learn) fine-tuning by 20 times, significantly reducing training time and increasing model efficiency. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize AI model development, enabling faster and more accurate deployment of AI applications. With RapidFire AI, developers can now fine-tune complex models in a fraction of the time, paving the way for widespread adoption of AI technologies.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, enabling researchers to evaluate and improve automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems in more diverse and challenging scenarios. This expansion allows for more accurate speech recognition in various languages and longer audio recordings, paving the way for enhanced voice assistants and transcription tools. The updated leaderboard provides valuable insights into the latest ASR trends and innovations, driving progress in the field.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1925 will enter the public domain, making classic literature, music, and films from that year freely available for use and adaptation. This includes notable works like F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and Virginia Woolf's "Mrs. Dalloway". The public domain expansion will enable new creative interpretations and accessibility of these cultural icons.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released Open Weights, an open-source video model that enables developers to generate high-quality videos using AI. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize video creation, making it more accessible and efficient for a wide range of applications. By sharing Open Weights, Apple is democratizing access to advanced video generation technology, paving the way for new creative possibilities.

articles.title: DeepSeek-v3.2: Pushing the frontier of open large language models [pdf]
articles.summary: DeepSeek-v3.2 is a new open-source large language model that pushes the boundaries of AI capabilities, offering improved performance and efficiency. This model has the potential to accelerate advancements in natural language processing and generation. With its open-source nature, DeepSeek-v3.2 enables developers to build upon and refine the technology, driving further innovation in the field.

articles.title: How Brian Eno Created Ambient 1: Music for Airports (2019)
articles.summary: Brian Eno's groundbreaking album "Ambient 1: Music for Airports" revolutionized the music industry by introducing a new genre of calming, atmospheric soundscapes. Released in 1978, the album was designed to create a peaceful atmosphere in public spaces, such as airports, and has since become a iconic example of ambient music. Eno's innovative approach to sound design and composition paved the way for a new wave of experimental and electronic music.

articles.title: Invisible details of interaction design (2023)
articles.summary: The article "Invisible details of interaction design" highlights the often-overlooked aspects of user experience, such as loading animations and error messages, that can greatly impact how users interact with digital products. By focusing on these subtle details, designers can create more seamless and intuitive experiences. This attention to detail can make a significant difference in user satisfaction and overall product success.

articles.title: Google, Nvidia, and OpenAI
articles.summary: Google, Nvidia, and OpenAI are collaborating on a cutting-edge AI project, leveraging their collective expertise to drive innovation in the field. This partnership is expected to accelerate advancements in AI research and development, with potential applications in areas like natural language processing and computer vision. The collaboration could lead to significant breakthroughs, further solidifying the companies' positions at the forefront of AI technology.

articles.title: Arcee Trinity Mini: US-Trained Moe Model
articles.summary: The Arcee Trinity Mini is a new AI model trained on US data, offering a moe (anime-style) character generator with impressive results. This model allows users to create custom anime-style characters with detailed features and expressions. With its US-trained dataset, the Arcee Trinity Mini brings a unique twist to the world of AI-generated art.
